mapper.sql: FROM SPORT_AGAINST_INFO B LEFT JOIN sport_draw_bj A ON A.SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN SPORT_DATA_BJ_SP C ON C.SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN LOTTERY_ISSUE E ON E.ISSUE_CODE = B.ISSUE_CODE AND E.LOTTERY_CODE = B.LOTTERY_CODE LEFT JOIN SPORT_MATCH_INFO M ON M.ID = B.SPORT_MATCH_INFO_ID AND M.MATCH_TYPE=1 LEFT JOIN SPORT_TEAM_INFO H ON H.ID = B.HOME_TEAM_ID AND H.TEAM_TYPE=1 LEFT JOIN SPORT_TEAM_INFO G ON G.ID = B.VISITI_TEAM_ID AND G.TEAM_TYPE=1 LEFT join sport_status_bj I on I.SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID = b.ID WHERE 1=1 AND B.LOTTERY_CODE = #{lotteryCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT B.ID AS againstId , B.ISSUE_CODE AS issueCode, B.SYSTEM_CODE AS systemCode, B.START_TIME AS startTime, B.MATCH_STATUS AS matchStatus, B.MATCH_ANALYSIS_URL AS analysisUrl, B.OFFICIAL_ID AS officialId, A.HALF_SCORE AS halfScore, A.FULL_SCORE AS fullScore, A.SP_GOAL_NUM AS spGoalNum, A.SP_HF_WDF AS spHfWdf, A.SP_UD_SD AS spUdSd, A.SP_SCORE AS spScore, E.SALE_STATUS AS saleStatus, M.MATCH_FULL_NAME AS matchFullName, M.MATCH_SHORT_NAME AS matchShortName, H.TEAM_FULL_NAME AS homeTeamFullName, H.TEAM_SHORT_NAME AS homeTeamShortName, G.TEAM_FULL_NAME AS guestTeamFullName, G.TEAM_SHORT_NAME AS guestTeamShortName, B.IS_RECOMMEND AS isRecommend
ORDER BY B.SYSTEM_CODE DESC,B.ID DESC

SELECT A.SYSTEM_CODE, A.HOME_NAME, A.VISITI_NAME, A.START_TIME, B.HALF_SCORE, B.FULL_SCORE, B.LET_WDF, B.LET_NUM, B.UD_SD, B.SCORE, B.GOAL_NUM, B.HF_WDF, B.SP_LET_WDF, B.SP_GOAL_NUM, B.SP_HF_WDF, B.SP_UD_SD, B.SP_SCORE FROM SPORT_AGAINST_INFO A LEFT JOIN SPORT_DRAW_BJ B ON A.ID = B.SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID WHERE A.LOTTERY_CODE = #{lotteryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.SYSTEM_CODE IN (${systemCode}) ORDER BY FIELD(A.SYSTEM_CODE, ${systemCode})
